markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skum (Ulat-Kini)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most numerous of the alghollthus are the ulat-kinis, a servitor race created from human stock to serve as rank-and-file soldiers in alghollthu armies. At the zenith of alghollthu power, ulat-kinis formed massive legions and enjoyed significant power over other species. When the alghollthus retreated from the world, they abandoned teeming hordes of ulatkinis. Although these erstwhile soldiers tried to continue their conquering ways, their numbers declined rapidly in battlefield defeats and purposeful exterminations enacted by their enemies. Ulat-kini society degenerated, so that now only a few enclaves exist in the depths of the earth or along isolated coastlines. Few remember their own species’ name, instead using the epithet their foes gave them: “skum.”

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Alghollthu_Skum.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Skum](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3)</title>

<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 12</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Items**
[Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 40

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +10,
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +10,
**Damage** 2d4+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +7 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

</column>
